!Detention Camp Warden: Once there was a major fight between the evil beings and the keepers of this dungeon camp. What a battle... Both sides suffered enormous casualties. But at least the conflict seems to have kept many of the lower level monsters in check. However, the strongest of the creatures have formed 3 groups and are regularly marauding through the camp. Judging from their recent activity, they're planning something, that's for sure. Your task will be to eliminate the *3 groups* so that the remaining evil creatures in the camp can be driven out. Kill the General Monster of the *last group*, and bring back the *Camp Prisoner Leader's Sign*. In return, I'll give you the Knight's Epaulette, which you can exchange for the fortress clan supply. Oh, one last thing: the prisoner leaders we've identified so far are *Brand the Exile, General Koenig and Gerg the Hunter*. I can admit you to the dungeon of the fortress right now. Please do me this favor!
